title: Victoria University Esports Club

embed.description: Venom: VU Esports Club. 9 likes. Social Club

body:
Venom: VU Esports Club is a new social group for students of Victoria University who participate and follow esports. Competitive gaming is becoming a popular form of entertainment, particularly with Melbourne seeking to become Australia's home of esports.

The objectives of the group are:
- To build a community of esports enthusiasts.
- To provide occasions for members to meet, play and discuss esports.
- To represent the University in league tournaments.
- To highlight pathways to professional esports.

The games we play include League of Legends, Overwatch, Fortnite, PUBG, Hearthstone, Dota, CS:GO.

Member benefits:
- Free entry to Venom events.
- Discounted entry to non-Venom events (if applicable).
- Discounted merchandise.
- Opportunity to join Discord/Twitch sessions.
- Opportunity to represent VU in esports events.

Join at https://www.facebook.com/Venom-VU-Esports-Club-1172895322879578
For more information, please contact vuesportsclub@gmail.com
